articles.title: Kerala Hospital Apologises For Using Morgan Freeman's Pic In Skin Treatment Ad - NDTV
articles.description: A hospital in Kerala has apologised for using a photo of American actor Morgan Freeman in a skin treatment ad.
articles.content:
A hospital has come under fire for using a photo of Morgan Freeman in a skin treatment ad

articles.title: US gives full approval to Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: U.S. health regulators on Monday granted full approval to Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine, a shot that's already been given to tens of millions of Americans since its emergency authorization over a year ago.
